title: Textile, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin damask with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
provenance: From the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Blue-green satin, brocaded in white, rose, green and light brown. Pattern is of tree with large scale fruit.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 18th century.
early 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: satin damask with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-64-a/c.
